title: Update app logo PNG and slightly enlarge the selected video container

requirements.summary: Replace the rendered app logo with the new 3D education globe + graduation cap PNG wherever the current logo is shown.
acceptanceCriteria: A PNG logo asset is added to the frontend static assets and is used as the rendered logo for the selected logo element.
The logo displayed in the UI is visually updated to the new 3D education globe + graduation cap style (not the previous logo).
The logo renders correctly without broken-image errors in the browser console.

file_operations.description: Add the generated PNG logo asset exactly as required (source provided in workspace assets as generated/app-logo.dim_512x512.png) so it is available as a static frontend asset.

Update the AppLogo component so the selected logo renders the new PNG from frontend/public/assets/generated/app-logo.dim_512x512.png as its primary source, while keeping an error fallback to the existing Thah Study logo to prevent broken-image issues.

requirements.summary: Adjust styling of the user-selected container so it appears slightly larger than the YouTube player while keeping the layout stable and avoiding overflow.
acceptanceCriteria: Only the selected div (XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[1]/div[1]) is resized/retuned; unrelated page elements remain unchanged.
After the change, the selected div is visually slightly larger than the embedded YouTube player area when viewed at typical mobile and desktop widths.
No layout overflow or horizontal scrolling is introduced by the size adjustment.

file_operations.description: Adjust Tailwind classes only on the specific wrapper <div> that contains the YouTube player (the user-selected container) to increase its effective size/visual prominence (e.g., add modest padding and/or min-height), ensuring no horizontal overflow and keeping surrounding layout unchanged.
